name: NU_BotulismTestsForClostridiumBotulinumToxinNucleicAcid
title: NU_Botulism (Tests for Clostridium botulinum Toxin Nucleic Acid)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Clostridium botulinum nucleic acid.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Clostridium botulinum nucleic acid;   
LOINC Search terms: "Clostridium botulinum (probe or sequencing) -panel"),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
